channel.title: nexiloop AI - Advanced AI Chat App
channel.description: nexiloop AI is an advanced AI chat app developed by Nexiloop with multi-model support. Latest updates, features, and AI news.

item.title: nexiloop AI 2.0 - Multi-Model AI Support Released
item.description: Experience the power of multiple AI models in one platform. Chat with OpenAI GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, Mistral, and local Ollama models.

item.title: AI Image Generation Now Available
item.description: Generate stunning images with natural language using Cloudflare Workers AI. Features FLUX.1 Schnell, SDXL Lightning, and more advanced models.

item.title: CodeHat Workspace - AI-Powered Development
item.description: Build applications with AI assistance using CodeHat workspace. Generate, edit, and run code with integrated terminal and file management.

item.title: Background Removal Beta Launch
item.description: Remove backgrounds from images instantly with AI-powered processing. One-click background removal for photos and graphics.

item.title: Local AI with Ollama Integration
item.description: Run AI models locally with Ollama integration. Privacy-focused AI chat without sending data to external servers.
